name: Compliment a team member
description: Reach out to a colleague and give them a genuine compliment on their recent work or contribution.

name: Connect on social media
description: Reach out to a professional contact on LinkedIn or another platform to strengthen your network.

name: Mindfulness meditation
description: Take 10 minutes for a mindfulness or wall-staring exercise to improve focus and creativity.

name: Intermittent fasting
description: Skip a meal or practice intermittent fasting to improve mental clarity and focus.

name: Exercise
description: Complete at least 20 minutes of physical exercise to boost your energy and mood.

name: Ask for feedback
description: Request specific feedback from a peer or manager on a recent project or presentation.

name: Technical practice
description: Solve a coding challenge or practice a technical skill to keep your abilities sharp.

name: Career social media post
description: Create a thoughtful post about your industry, technical insights, or career development.

name: Read career content
description: Read a chapter from a career development book or an industry article.

name: Healthy sleep habits
description: Go to bed early and ensure proper hydration for optimal performance tomorrow.

name: Code review
description: Provide a thorough and helpful code review for a teammate's pull request.

name: Document a process
description: Document a process or create a guide that will help your team or future team members.

name: Meeting facilitation
description: Volunteer to lead or facilitate a meeting to practice your leadership skills.

name: Presentation prep
description: Spend time preparing for an upcoming presentation or create a short demo to share with your team.

name: Mentor someone
description: Offer guidance or mentorship to a junior colleague or someone looking to enter your field.
